attributes.background: Jo Brand has been a trail blazer for women in the UK, driving womens’ comedy and raising over £100m for charity over her amazing career. She has enriched the lives of so many, please please give this amazing woman a Dame-hood.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
